org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom

Class RecipeMatcher<M extends IMachine,R extends IRecipe>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom.RecipeMatcher<M,R>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRecipeMatcher<M,R>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RecipePropertyMatcher

    public abstract class RecipeMatcher<M extends IMachine,R extends IRecipe>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRecipeMatcher<M,R>
    Helper class to abstract away some function logic (lambdas would make this way simpler though). It allows you to define a matching criteria and allows you to filter out recipe that match these criteria and those that do not. You do this by implementing the matches() method, which should return true when the criteria of the given recipe are met, or false otherwise.
